name: print
description: Outputs a message to the server console. Useful for debugging and logging information from your mod scripts.

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: The message to print to the console

returns.description: This function does not return a value

example:
-- Simple message
print("Hello, World!")

-- Print variables
local playerName = "John"
print("Player name: " .. playerName)

-- Print numbers
local score = 1500
print("Score: " .. score)

-- Debug information
print("Script loaded successfully")
notes: Messages appear in the server console with [VASTE-MOD] prefix
Use string concatenation (..) to combine text and variables
Useful for debugging mod behavior and tracking execution flow
